comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content: This photo is of Ltn. Paul Bäumer who flew with Fliegerabteilung 7, Jasta 5, and Jasta Boelcke. After most of his service as an NCO, he was promoted to officer rank of Leutnant and earned the Pour le Merite. He is credited with 43 confirmed victories and survived the war, but was killed when testflyng the Rohrback Rofix fighter in 1926 when he crashed into the sea and drowned before he could be rescued.
